p: Postharvest weight loss due to moisture loss can cause deterioration and shrinking of leaf tissue [ 52]. In this study, up to 7.51% weight loss was observed with the application of AA, while chitosan and Chitosan+AA resulted to lower weight losses. Chitosan application to a plant surface (via dipping or spraying) can form an edible coating that can act as a gas barrier (O 2 and CO 2) exchange and slow respiration rate [ 28, 53]. It has also been suggested that edible coatings when applied to fresh produce might prevent moisture losses [ 53], and the combination of edible coating material with hydrophobic and hydrophilic properties is preferred on postharvest applications.
